thread.title: Twitter reacts as Henrikh Mkhitaryan scores, then goes off injured as Manchester United take on Saint-Etienne
thread.title_full: Twitter reacts as Henrikh Mkhitaryan scores, then goes off injured as Manchester United take on Saint-Etienne

author: jhutchinson
title: Twitter reacts as Henrikh Mkhitaryan scores, then goes off injured as Manchester United take on Saint-Etienne
text:
INJURY BLOW Twitter reacts as Henrikh Mkhitaryan scores, then goes off injured as Manchester United take on Saint-Etienne 
The Armenian came off holding his hamstring, and he could have suffered the injury in the process of scoring Breaking Comments HENRIKH MKHITARYAN scored, then went off injured in Manchester United’s away clash at Saint-Etienne tonight. 
The little Armenian poked home a delightful Juan Mata cross in the 16th minute to put United into a 4-0 aggregate lead. Reuters Henrikh Mkhitaryan appeared to feel a twinge in his hamstring, and was replaced on 25 minutes by Marcus Rashford Getty Images 5 United boss Jose Mourinho did not look best pleased to see the goalscorer go off the field injured 
But then, worryingly for his boss Jose Mourinho, came off the field in the 25th minute holding his hamstring to be replaced with Marcus Rashford . 
Keep up to date with ALL the MANCHESTER UNITED news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
It didn’t appear an early tactical decision by Mourinho, as Mkhitaryan was earlier pictured holding his leg, and went straight down the tunnel. Reuters Mkhitaryan disappeared down the tunnel as a gutted Mourinho watched on Reuters Less than ten minutes earlier, the little Armenian had put United into an early lead, and effectively kill off the tie United fans after hearing Mkhitaryan is injured with the cup final this weekend… #ManUtd #UEL pic.twitter.com/72fGQQT1vN
